Text:
Thanks so much. I'm loving this new series. It's like I can forget all the expanded universe odd crap that's been produced since the prequel era and just imagine that Star Wars world I grew up with. 

Here's hoping this series goes on to New Republic, the art is gorgeous.

yes i remember comics alliance had a review and called the 1st issue "the most star warsiest comic in years" lol -- but that's so true!

and i agree on the art, carlos d'anda is a potential superstar.
